TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataFormats extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 ，預先定義的 格式名稱。
請用它們識別儲存於 中的資料的格式。

span.span: Use them to identify the format of data that you store in an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和類別也會使用`static`格式清單，以判斷從系統擷取的資料型別，或可轉移拖放作業中。The and classes also use the `static` format list to determine the type of data that is retrieved from the system , or that is transferred in a drag-and-drop operation. 方法可讓您：The method allows you to: - 取得預先定義格式名稱或識別碼的物件。Get a predefined object for a format name or ID number. - 加入新的格式名稱/識別碼數字組`static`清單在此類別中，以及向 Windows 登錄中，以註冊格式格式化時傳遞的格式名稱。Add a new format name/ID number pair to the `static` list in this class, and to register the format with the Windows registry as a format when you pass it the format name. 您可以取得數目或格式中適當的屬性從執行個體。You can get the number or format from the appropriate property in the instance. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立新的資料格式，名為`myFormat`。The following code example creates a new data format named `myFormat`. 程式碼接著會建立`MyNewObject`，其儲存在。The code then creates a `MyNewObject` which it stores in a . 複製到。The is copied to the . 下一步擷取自和`MyNewObject`復原。Next, the is retrieved from the and the `MyNewObject` is recovered. 值`MyNewObject`列印在文字方塊中。The value of the `MyNewObject` is printed in a text box. 此程式碼需要`textBox1`已經建立，並在表單上。This code requires that `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic DataFormats Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataFormats Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DataFormats Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataFormats Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DataFormats Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataFormats Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Bitmap As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows 點陣圖的格式。
這個 欄位是唯讀的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 點陣圖表示電腦圖形為記憶體中的位元陣列，而這些位元代表屬性的映像中的個別像素。A bitmap represents a computer graphic as an array of bits in memory, and these bits represent the attributes of the individual pixels in an image. 這個欄位由介面和類別，以指定的資料類型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 加入時或實作，使用此欄位的格式為和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此類型的物件是否存在，請使用此欄位的格式為和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要取得此類型的物件，請使用這個做為格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.

span.span: Specifies a comma-separated value (CSV) format, which is a common interchange format used by spreadsheets.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Dib As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows 與裝置無關的點陣圖 (DIB) 格式。

span.span: Specifies the Windows device-independent bitmap (DIB) format.

summary.span: 這個 欄位是唯讀的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks DIB 是設計是為了確保可以載入並顯示在另一個應用程式完全它們是出現在原始的應用程式的方式使用一個應用程式所建立的點陣圖形檔格式。DIB is a file format designed to ensure that bitmapped graphics created using one application can be loaded and displayed in another application exactly the way they appeared in the originating application. 這個欄位由介面和類別，以指定的資料類型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 加入時或實作，使用此欄位的格式為和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此類型的物件是否存在，請使用此欄位的格式為和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要取得此類型的物件，請使用這個做為格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Dif As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows 資料交換格式 (DIF)，Windows Form 不會直接使用這種格式。

span.span: Specifies the Windows Data Interchange Format (DIF), which Windows Forms does not directly use.

summary.span: 這個 欄位是唯讀的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 差異是 ASCII 碼可以簡化其使用與傳輸到其他程式化資料庫、 試算表，以及相似的文件所組成的格式。DIF is a format consisting of ASCII codes in which database, spreadsheet, and similar documents can be structured to facilitate their use by and transfer to other programs. 這個欄位由介面和類別，以指定的資料類型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 加入時或實作，使用此欄位的格式為和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此類型的物件是否存在，請使用此欄位的格式為和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要取得此類型的物件，請使用這個做為格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. [!code-cpp[DataFormats_CommaSeparatedValue#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_CommaSeparatedValue/CPP/dataformats_dif.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataFormats_CommaSeparatedValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_CommaSeparatedValue/CS/dataformats_dif.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataFormats_CommaSeparatedValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_CommaSeparatedValue/VB/dataformats_dif.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly EnhancedMetafile As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows 加強型中繼檔 (Metafile) 格式。

span.span: Specifies the Windows enhanced metafile format.

summary.span: 這個 欄位是唯讀的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中繼檔格式是儲存影像的圖形物件，而不是像素為單位的 Windows 檔案。The metafile format is a Windows file that stores an image in terms of graphic objects rather than pixels. 重新調整大小時，中繼檔將保存優於點陣圖的影像。When resized, a metafile preserves an image better than a bitmap. > [!NOTE] > 使用剪貼簿的中繼檔格式時，可能需要特殊考量。Special considerations may be necessary when using the metafile format with the clipboard. 因為在目前的實作限制類別，.NET Framework 所使用的中繼檔格式可能無法辨識的應用程式使用較舊的中繼檔格式。Due to a limitation in the current implementation of the class, the metafile format used by the .NET Framework may not be recognized by applications that use an older metafile format. 在此情況下，您必須與 Win32 剪貼簿應用程式開發介面 (Api) 的互通。In this case, you must interoperate with the Win32 Clipboard application programming interfaces (APIs). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 323530，"中繼檔上剪貼簿是不可見到所有應用程式 」 在 Microsoft 知識庫文件在http://support.microsoft.com。For more information, see article 323530, "Metafiles on Clipboard Are Not Visible to All Applications," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. 這個欄位由介面和類別，以指定的資料類型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 加入時或實作，使用此欄位的格式為和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此類型的物件是否存在，請使用此欄位的格式為和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要取得此類型的物件，請使用這個做為格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly FileDrop As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows 的檔案置放格式，Windows Form 不會直接使用這種格式。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此格式與 shell 檔案拖曳互動拖放作業期間。You can use this format to interact with shell file drags during drag-and-drop operations. 這個欄位由介面和類別，以指定的資料類型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 加入時或實作，使用此欄位的格式為和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此類型的物件是否存在，請使用此欄位的格式為和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要取得此類型的物件，請使用這個做為格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.

span.span: Returns a with the Windows Clipboard numeric ID and name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats/Format GetFormat(int32 id) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetFormat (id As Integer) As DataFormats.Format

summary.span: 傳回有 Windows 剪貼簿的數字 ID 和指定 ID 名稱的 。

span.span: Returns a with the Windows Clipboard numeric ID and name for the specified ID.

returns.span: 有 Windows 剪貼簿的數字 ID 和格式名稱的 。

span.span: A that has the Windows Clipboard numeric ID and the name of the format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員通常用來註冊原生的剪貼簿格式。This member is typically used to register native Clipboard formats. 呼叫，當您想要擷取的識別碼包含格式識別碼/名稱組的執行個體。Call with an ID number when you want to retrieve a instance that contains the ID/format name pair. 一般而言，您所使用的應用程式的建立者所發行的識別碼名稱和號碼介面。Typically, the ID name and number is published by the creator of the application that you are using the to interface with. 例如，在 Visual Basic 中的動態資料交換 (DDE) 交談資訊的識別碼是`&HBF00`，且格式名稱是`vbCFLink`。For example, the ID number for Dynamic Data Exchange (DDE) conversation information in Visual Basic is `&HBF00`, and the format name is `vbCFLink`. 呼叫這個方法將格式識別碼/名稱組加入任何唯一識別碼`static`清單的格式名稱/識別碼組類別。Call this method with any unique ID number to add the ID/format name pair to the `static` list of format name/ID pairs in the class. 藉由串連"Format"及識別碼，將會建立新的名稱。The new name will be created by concatenating "Format" and the ID number. 此組未註冊為新格式化，因為您未提供的名稱。This pair is not registered as a new format because you have not provided a name. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. [!code-cpp[DataFormats_GetFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_GetFormat/CPP/dataformats_getformat.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataFormats_GetFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_GetFormat/CS/dataformats_getformat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataFormats_GetFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_GetFormat/VB/dataformats_getformat.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats/Format GetFormat(string format) cil managed

summary.span: 傳回指定格式的 Windows 剪貼簿數字 ID 和名稱的 。

span.span: Returns a with the Windows Clipboard numeric ID and name for the specified format.

returns.span: 有 Windows 剪貼簿的數字 ID 和格式名稱的 。

span.span: A that has the Windows Clipboard numeric ID and the name of the format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫當現有的格式所需的 Windows 剪貼簿的數字 ID 的格式名稱。Call with the format name when you need a Windows Clipboard numeric ID for an existing format. 呼叫這個方法與您自己的格式名稱來建立新的類型的格式。Call this method with your own format name to create a new format type. 如果指定的格式不存在，這個方法會註冊為使用 Windows 登錄的剪貼簿格式的名稱，並取得獨特格式的識別項。If the specified format does not exist, this method will register the name as a Clipboard format with the Windows registry and get a unique format identifier. 將加入這個新的名稱/識別碼組`static`清單的格式名稱/識別碼組類別。This new name/ID pair will be added to the `static` list of format name/ID pairs in the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擷取表示的格式名稱/識別碼組。The following code example shows how to retrieve a representing a format name/ID pair. 要求格式時，和擷取的內容會顯示在文字方塊中。The format is requested, and the contents of the retrieved are displayed in a text box. 此程式碼需要`textBox1`具現化。This code requires `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic DataFormats.GetFormat Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataFormats.GetFormat Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DataFormats.GetFormat Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataFormats.GetFormat Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DataFormats.GetFormat Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataFormats.GetFormat Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 新的 格式登錄失敗。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中繼檔格式是儲存影像的圖形物件，而不是像素為單位的 Windows 檔案。The metafile format is a Windows file that stores an image in terms of graphic objects rather than pixels. 重新調整大小時，中繼檔將保存優於點陣圖的影像。When resized, a metafile preserves an image better than a bitmap. > [!NOTE] > 使用剪貼簿的中繼檔格式時，可能需要特殊考量。Special considerations may be necessary when using the metafile format with the clipboard. 因為在目前的實作限制類別，.NET Framework 所使用的中繼檔格式可能無法辨識的應用程式使用較舊的中繼檔格式。Due to a limitation in the current implementation of the class, the metafile format used by the .NET Framework may not be recognized by applications that use an older metafile format. 在此情況下，您必須與 Win32 剪貼簿應用程式開發介面 (Api) 的互通。In this case, you must interoperate with the Win32 Clipboard application programming interfaces (APIs). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 323530，"中繼檔上剪貼簿是不可見到所有應用程式 」 在 Microsoft 知識庫文件在http://support.microsoft.com。For more information, see article 323530, "Metafiles on Clipboard Are Not Visible to All Applications," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. 這個欄位由介面和類別，以指定的資料類型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 加入時或實作，使用此欄位的格式為和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此類型的物件是否存在，請使用此欄位的格式為和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要取得此類型的物件，請使用這個做為格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks RIFF 是完備的規格，專門用於中定義為不同的多媒體檔案類型的標準格式。RIFF is a broad-based specification, designed to be used in defining standard formats for different types of multimedia files. 這個欄位由介面和類別，以指定的資料類型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 加入時或實作，使用此欄位的格式為和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此類型的物件是否存在，請使用此欄位的格式為和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要取得此類型的物件，請使用這個做為格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.

span.span: Specifies text consisting of Rich Text Format (RTF) data.

summary.span: 這個 欄位是唯讀的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks RTF 是用於傳送的文件內容架構調格式化應用程式之間的文字文件。RTF is an adaptation of Document Content Architecture that is used for transferring formatted text documents between applications. 這個欄位由介面和類別，以指定的資料類型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 加入時或實作，使用此欄位的格式為和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此類型的物件是否存在，請使用此欄位的格式為和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要取得此類型的物件，請使用這個做為格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods. RTF 格式的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN library 中的 Rtf 格式規格http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information about the RTF format, see the Rich Text Format specification in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Serializable As String

summary.span: 指定用來封裝任何類型的 Windows Form 物件的格式。

span.span: Specifies a format that encapsulates any type of Windows Forms object.

summary.span: 這個 欄位是唯讀的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個欄位由介面和類別，以指定的資料類型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 加入時或實作，使用此欄位的格式為和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此類型的物件是否存在，請使用此欄位的格式為和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要取得此類型的物件，請使用這個做為格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods. > [!NOTE] > 可序列化的格式只為特定的 Windows Form 和 Windows Form 以外建立的應用程式將無法辨識。The serializable format is specific to Windows Forms only and will not be recognized by applications created outside of Windows Forms.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly StringFormat As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows Form 字串類別格式，Windows Form 會用這個格式儲存字串物件。

summary.span: 這個 欄位是唯讀的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個欄位由介面和類別，以指定的資料類型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 加入時或實作，使用此欄位的格式為和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此類型的物件是否存在，請使用此欄位的格式為和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要取得此類型的物件，請使用這個做為格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods. > [!NOTE] > 字串類別格式只為特定的 Windows Form 和 Windows Form 以外建立的應用程式將無法辨識。The string class format is specific to Windows Forms only and will not be recognized by applications created outside of Windows Forms. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly SymbolicLink As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows 符號連結格式，Windows Form 不會直接使用這種格式。

span.span: Specifies the Windows symbolic link format, which Windows Forms does not directly use.

summary.span: 這個 欄位是唯讀的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 符號連結是磁碟目錄項目會取代檔案的目錄項目，但不是實際的不同目錄中的檔案參考。A symbolic link is a disk directory entry that takes the place of a directory entry for a file, but is actually a reference to a file in a different directory. 別名、 快速鍵、 軟式連結或符號連結，也稱為符號連結。A symbolic link is also called an alias, shortcut, soft link, or symlink. 這個欄位由介面和類別，以指定的資料類型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 加入時或實作，使用此欄位的格式為和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此類型的物件是否存在，請使用此欄位的格式為和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要取得此類型的物件，請使用這個做為格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.

summary.span: 這個 欄位是唯讀的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks TIFF 是常用的掃描、 存放裝置，以及交換的灰階圖形影像以標準檔案格式。TIFF is a standard file format commonly used for scanning, storage, and interchanges of gray-scale graphic images. 這個欄位由介面和類別，以指定的資料類型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 加入時或實作，使用此欄位的格式為和方法。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此類型的物件是否存在，請使用此欄位的格式為和方法。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要取得此類型的物件，請使用這個做為格式和方法。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.
